testcase.name: Click on £10 - £15 price range
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the home page of argos website.............................passed When user types puma in the search box......................................passed And user clicks on the search button........................................passed And user should be able to see all the puma products........................passed And user clicks on £10 - £15 price range checkbox...........................passed Then user should able to see all the items within that price range..........passed
